description: Data set contains revenue for actual fiscal years and five financial plan fiscal years. Revenue include Taxes, Miscellaneous Revenues, Unrestricted Intergovernmental Aid, Disallowance of Categorical Grants, Federal Grants, State Grants, Other Categorical Grants, and Capital IFA. Additional revenue subcategories provided for Miscellaneous Revenues, Federal Grants, and State Grants.

name: NYC Budget Revenue Additional
